_meanings:
{@--1@} To be bound or
fettered, to be confined or 
imprisoned; <ls>Y. 2. 243.</ls>

{@--2@} To be joined
or bound together.

{@--3@} To be 
formed, built or constructed.

{@--6@} Not having the menses
or menstrual discharge.

{@--7@} (At
the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Deprived or 
destitute of.
